summary.span: 实现按用户定义的时间间隔引发事件的计时器。

span.span: Implements a timer that raises an event at user-defined intervals.

summary.span: 此计时器最宜用于 Windows 窗体应用程序中，并且必须在窗口中使用。

span.span: This timer is optimized for use in Windows Forms applications and must be used in a window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A用于在用户定义的时间间隔引发事件。A is used to raise an event at user-defined intervals. 此 Windows 计时器专为使用 UI 线程来执行处理的单线程方式的环境。This Windows timer is designed for a single-threaded environment where UI threads are used to perform processing. 此过程要求用户代码有一个可用的用户界面消息泵，并始终从相同线程中，运行或到另一个线程的调用封送。It requires that the user code have a UI message pump available and always operate from the same thread, or marshal the call onto another thread. 当你使用此计时器时，使用事件以执行轮询操作也可为指定的时间段显示初始屏幕。When you use this timer, use the event to perform a polling operation or to display a splash screen for a specified period of time. 每当属性设置为`true`和属性是大于零，时间间隔基于引发事件属性设置。Whenever the property is set to `true` and the property is greater than zero, the event is raised at intervals based on the property setting. 此类提供方法设置的时间间隔，还可以启动和停止计时器。This class provides methods to set the interval, and to start and stop the timer. > [!NOTE] > Windows 窗体 Timer 组件是单线程的且最多 55 毫秒的准确性。The Windows Forms Timer component is single-threaded, and is limited to an accuracy of 55 milliseconds. 如果需要更准确地多线程的计时器，使用类命名空间。If you require a multithreaded timer with greater accuracy, use the class in the namespace. ## Examples 下面的示例实现简单的间隔计时器，该警报计时器每五秒。The following example implements a simple interval timer, which sets off an alarm every five seconds. 警报出现时，显示警报已启动并询问用户是否计时器应继续运行次数的计数。When the alarm occurs, a displays a count of the number of times the alarm has started and prompts the user as to whether the timer should continue to run.
